name: kvn
text: A comment left by kvn was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sprog, mikejk305, VictoriaW)

name: philosophe
text: He's calling T back because he dropped his cordless in the Jacuzzi.

name: deimosrising
text: The movement lines in panel three are perfect.

name: lux
text: Most shocking announcements and phone-drops are accompanied by two tiny guidelines letting the reader infer that it fell. Ray's surprise is just so stone cold heavy that the lines go all the way to the ground without interruption

name: soticoto
text: The jacuzzi ain't interrupting cos it was there first.

name: abe
text: A comment left by abe was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, madnes, biomusicologist, fakead, djwhiterabbit, Jesusaurus, Thorfinn, Leon_Sumbitches, cmjhogan, farqussus, RBisme, Madoushi, motts, STUART)

name: saint
text: re-phrasing a line in the strip is not chubby-worthy.

name: ambala
text: Ray is stone cold stuned by this development.

name: chaesar
text: Gotta set the record straight, Ray ain't neutered for nothin, cause that cat thong sure ain't full of promises.

name: tellumo
text: Products are available for that .

name: quantumcasaba
text: wow.

name: sneakernets
text: I think more chaps would agree to neuter their pet if they knew about Neuticles.

name: i_love_kate
text: Neuticles! What news from the North?

name: anomalous3
text:
One of my favorite strips of all time.
Why does tina have a hot tub in this one, whereas later their classes are reversed?

name: alejandroadam
text: not so much *her* tub as it is her apt complexs tub.

name: sageinarage
text: He says he's BEEN at Tina's.  He is now at home.

name: deancain29
text: Perfect comic strip timing.

name: achewoodzno1fan
text: this is the comic where i realized it was about the cats not the bears

name: shoinan
text: Hell, this is the comic where Onstad realized it was about the cats and not the bears.

name: antsama
text: The standard font for all the sound effects in the strip are almost synchronized perfectly with the flow.

name: dovey
text: Ray is wearing his phone talking jacket

name: dovey
text: Ray is wearing his talking on the phone jacket

name: molesticide
text:
that happened twice, but it's still different? i don't... what?

your comment. (s)

name: farqussus
text: both of those comments got the same chubby lame ratio. This is terrifying.

name: skiddyfisk
text: My feelings on this strip are relevant to the content of the strip.

name: rowboat
text: From your lack of chubbies, I have to imagine that a lot of people didn't get your subtle joke. But I did.

name: _cheesekayke
text: PHONE JACKET

name: aurorasbored
text: None of you noticed that Ray drops the phone before he drops his smoke. I had to sign up to just point this out in consternation and now will be here for life.

name: foetus_punch
text: And nobody cared. A single tear rolls down my dace, only to drip embarrassingly off my nose like a child's snot.

name: zapatos
text: Why would he drop the cig?  The phone was the harbinger, not the nicotene.

name: rowboat
text: We get through the façade quickly. Now Ray is Ray.

name: i_love_kate
text:
I get the feeling that everyone else is too terrified to point out the grammatical error in the title.

Either that or just not pedantic enough.

name: kamet
text: Hee.. I was gonna mention that...

name: zapatos
text: If the title is Ray trying to explain, then its not so much a grammatical error as it is him just being anxious.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Oh jesus you don't know how many times I had to read the title before I could figure out what the hell you were talking about. I just automatically corrected it in my head. It's like that thing. This thing here.

[IMGS OFF]

name: coco
text: You know it's serious when Ray puts on the jacket. It's a jacket of truth.

name: red-barchetta
text: I had to laugh out loud at this one! Instant 5 !

name: seph
text: Ray gets much more comfortable in water as the strip goes on. Future strips show him much more submerged.

name: arelladawn
text: LOL my cat is neutered and this strip makes me not feel bad about removing his drive to ever, ever try to get hella freaky with a lady cat.
